meanings.sent1: The sylva was filled with tall trees and chirping birds.
meanings.sent2: We took a walk through the sylva and enjoyed the peaceful surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the sylva held a secret meeting under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The sylva whispered ancient stories to those who listened closely.
meanings.sent5: The sylva seemed to breathe with a life of its own, embracing all who entered.

meanings.definition: A collection of trees or shrubs.
meanings.sent1: The botanical garden displayed a diverse sylva of plants from around the world.
meanings.sent2: The landscaper carefully arranged the sylva to create a harmonious garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns in the sylva, playing a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The sylva stood like a green fortress, guarding the secrets of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The sylva in the park was a colorful mosaic of leaves and branches, a true work of art.

meanings.definition: The trees of a particular region or period.
meanings.sent1: The ancient sylva of the Jurassic period housed mighty dinosaurs.
meanings.sent2: The sylva in this region is known for its unique blend of tree species.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns in the sylva, playing a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The sylva of memories whispered tales of the past to those who wandered through.
meanings.sent5: The sylva of autumn painted the landscape in hues of red, orange, and gold.
